children.text: <input type='radio' name='Pms' value='pms1' class='authRadio'> 訂房

<input type='radio' name='room-style' value='room2' class='authRadio'> 訂房Role B
<input type='radio' name='Pms' value='pms2' class='authRadio'> 接待
<input type='radio' name='reception' value='reception1' class='authRadio'> 接待Role A
<input type='radio' name='reception' value='reception2' class='authRadio'> 接待Role B
<input type='radio' name='Pms' value='pms3' class='authRadio'> 出納
<input type='radio' name='cash' value='cash1' class='authRadio'> 出納Role A
<input type='radio' name='cash' value='cash2' class='authRadio'> 出納Role B
<input type='radio' name='Pms' value='pms4' class='authRadio'> 房務

<input type='radio' name='house' value='house2' class='authRadio'> 房務Role B
